data.description: Exceptional and fast aluminum yacht. Perfectly manoeuvrable thanks to IPS drives. Very generous space. The quality of the interior and surface finish goes far beyond the standard of this size yachts. A luxurious performance yacht for an owner who is looking for something outside the mainstream. Ralph Weil at De Valk Berlin is your go-to contact for any questions. Feel free to give us a call.
data.advance_package: Additional control for electric searchlight Air; Conditioning system 72 000 BTU; Decor upgrade; Double RACOR filters; Easy-docking manoeuvring joystick Marex; Electric mooring winches in cockpit; Extra conduits; Generator; Grey-water tank washing system
data.exterior: Co-pilot seat on flybridge; Flybridge furniture on starboard; Hard-top with electric awning and painted mast (Island Volcanic); Manoeuvring lights on bow; Mid-ship cleats (N.2); Pop-up cleats on transom (N.4); Storage locker on transom; Telescopic gangway; Under-water lights on transom (N.2); Deck-wash outlets on bow and stern
data.interior: Carpet Ottanio Green in lower-deck lobby and cabins; Roman shade blinds with black-out system; Safe in master cabin; Saloon door curtain with black-out system; Shuko sockets (instead of standard); Vanity furniture in master cabin; Coffee table in salon on cockpit seat; Dimmer lights throughout; Mosquito nets for portholes
data.appliances: Barbecue for flybridge furniture; Dishwasher in galley; Icemaker in galley; Washer/dryer; Wine cooler in galley
data.electronics: Raymarine AIS 700; Raymarine fishfinder; Raymarine Platinum navigation package
